title: Full Stack Developer
description:
For 3 months, I rejoined the Rakuten DX teams to continue the development of a PWA. My tasks remained the same as in my previous mission but with more responsibilities for the quality of deliverables.

Mission characteristics reminder:
- 100% English environment (meetings, documentation, communication, etc.)
- Frontend: TypeScript, WebComponent with LitElement, Ionic router, Jasmine tests
- Backend: TypeScript, Node.JS with NestJS framework, integration with Prismic and Guardian APIs, Jest tests
- Data: Use of Prismic CMS and Cloud Firestore
- Deployment: Google Cloud Platform
- Authentication: Implementation of Okta authentication
